data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bifi, Alessandro Gasparetto, Pavanelli, Carla Simone, Zawadzki, Cláudio Henrique (2009): Three new species of Ancistrus Kner, 1854 (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the Rio Iguaçu basin, Paraná State, Brazil. Zootaxa 2275: 41-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191064
